mapper.select: select fstvl_Nm, fstvl_Start_Date, fstvl_End_Date, fstvl_Co, phone_Number , ft_Code from festival_info
mapper.update: MERGE INTO festival_info USING ( SELECT #{fstvlNm} as fstvlNm, #{opar} as opar, #{fstvlStartDate} as fstvlStartDate, #{fstvlEndDate} as fstvlEndDate, #{fstvlCo} as fstvlCo, #{mnnst} as mnnst, #{auspcInstt} as auspcInstt, #{suprtInstt} as suprtInstt, #{phoneNumber} as phoneNumber, #{homepageUrl} as homepageUrl, #{relateInfo} as relateInfo, #{rdnmadr} as rdnmadr, #{lnmadr} as lnmadr, #{latitude} as latitude, #{longitude} as longitude, #{referenceDate} as referenceDate, #{insttCode} as insttcode FROM DUAL ) T1 ON (festival_info.fstvl_Nm = T1.fstvlNm) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET festival_info.opar = T1.opar, festival_info.fstvl_Start_Date = T1.fstvlStartDate, festival_info.fstvl_End_Date = T1.fstvlEndDate, festival_info.fstvl_Co = T1.fstvlCo, festival_info.mnnst = T1.mnnst, festival_info.auspc_Instt = T1.auspcInstt, festival_info.suprt_Instt = T1.suprtInstt, festival_info.phone_Number = T1.phoneNumber, festival_info.homepage_Url = T1.homepageUrl, festival_info.relate_Info = T1.relateInfo, festival_info.rdnmadr = T1.rdnmadr, festival_info.lnmadr = T1.lnmadr, festival_info.latitude = T1.latitude, festival_info.longitude = T1.longitude, festival_info.reference_Date = T1.referenceDate, festival_info.instt_code = T1.insttcode WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ft_Code, fstvl_Nm, opar, fstvl_Start_Date, fstvl_End_Date, fstvl_Co, mnnst, auspc_Instt, suprt_Instt, phone_Number, homepage_Url, relate_Info, rdnmadr, lnmadr, latitude, longitude, reference_Date, instt_Code ) VALUES ( NVL((SELECT ft_code FROM (SELECT ft_code FROM festival_info ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1), 0)+1, T1.fstvlNm, T1.opar, T1.fstvlStartDate, T1.fstvlEndDate, T1.fstvlCo, T1.mnnst, T1.auspcInstt, T1.suprtInstt, T1.phoneNumber, T1.homepageUrl, T1.relateInfo, T1.rdnmadr, T1.lnmadr, T1.latitude, T1.longitude, T1.referenceDate, T1.insttCode )
